text: Christine Joan Taylor (born July 30, 1971 in Allentown, Pennsylvania) is an American actress and comedian. She played the character Marcia in The Brady Bunch Movie and A Very Brady Sequel. She also starred in Party Girl, a television program based on the 1995 comedy of the same name. Taylor dated actor Matthew Lillard in 1995. Taylor married actor Ben Stiller in 2000. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Allentown, Pennsylvania
title: Christine Taylor
